select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.qyryskxxtjmxid qyryskxxtjmxid,a.sksj sksj,a.qybm qybm,a.qymc qymc,a.gxdwbm gxdwbm,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.xm xm,a.kh kh,a.ryid ryid,a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm from t_qyryskxxtj a where 1=1
order by a.sksj desc) z where rownum <= $endRow$) x where rowno >$beginRow$
select count(1) a from t_qyryskxxtj a where 1=1

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select distinct a.ryid ryid, a.rzrq rzrq, a.ssqybm ssqybm, a.ssqymc ssqymc, a.ssqygxdwdm ssqygxdwdm, a.ssqygxdwmc ssqygxdwmc from t_qyryskxxtj a where 1=1
a.hylbdm =#hylbdm#
a.zjhm =#zjhm#
a.cyrybh =#cyrybh#
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(1) a from (select distinct a.ryid ryid, a.rzrq rzrq, a.ssqybm ssqybm, a.ssqymc ssqymc, a.ssqygxdwdm ssqygxdwdm, a.ssqygxdwmc ssqygxdwmc from t_qyryskxxtj a where 1=1
a.hylbdm =#hylbdm#
a.zjhm =#zjhm#
a.cyrybh =#cyrybh#
)

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from ( select ryid, cyrybh, xm, zjhm,cyrylbdm, bhNum from (select t.ryid ryid, t.cyrybh cyrybh, t.xm xm, t.zjhm zjhm, t.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm, count(distinct t.ssqybm ) bhNum
from t_qyryskxxtj t where 1=1
group by t.ryid, t.cyrybh, t.xm, t.zjhm,t.cyrylbdm) where 1=1
order by $pageSort$) z where rownum <= $endRow$) x where rowno >$beginRow$

select count(1) from (select t.ryid ryid, t.cyrybh cyrybh, t.xm xm, t.zjhm zjhm, t.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm, count(distinct t.ssqybm ) bhNum from t_qyryskxxtj t where 1=1
group by t.ryid, t.cyrybh, t.xm, t.zjhm,t.cyrylbdm) where 1=1
